exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R x, l : R H1 : limit1_in f (fun y : R => y <> x) l x H2 : R -> Prop Unable to unify "is_lim f x l -> limit1_in f (fun y : R => y <> x) l x" with "Rbar_locally l H2 -> filtermap f (Rbar_locally' x) H2".
In environment f : R -> R x, l : R H1 : limit1_in f (fun y : R => y <> x) l x H2 : R -> Prop Unable to unify "R -> Prop" with "Rbar_locally l H2 -> filtermap f (Rbar_locally' x) H2".

original: intros H1. unfold is_lim. unfold filterlim. intros H2. apply (is_lim_Reals_0 f x l). unfold limit_in in H2. apply H2.
